Text:
Maybe some of you found another torrent of the Epica Discography I made, that one missed some files. 

This one is perfectly complete and has no double files. It also contains the lyrics of all songs!

Have fun with it,
~Betohaku
oh...you can visit my torrents if you find anything there that you like
This is missing a few files in "The Road to Paradiso" and most of the files in "We Will Take You With Us." Everything else seems to be accounted for, though.
